value.title: Remove or Unpublish “Publish to Web” Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this video, we will talk the procedure of removing a Power BI report after it has been publishing to web and anonymously accessed on web.  Sometimes, there is a situation where we have published a report with web option and generated iframe code to embed the report in our custom application. Now,

value.title: Show/Hide Multiple Data Values using TME AG Toggle Switch – Custom Visual – Toggle Switch by TME AG
value.excerpt: During this session, we will explore one of the custom visuals in Power BI which is TME AG Toggle Switch in Power BI.   Sometimes, we need to show/hide data values based on Toggle Switch. Let’s consider one real-life example where we need to show Weekend and Weekday data. I want to provide one switch

value.title: Use SharePoint Online List as A Data Source In Power BI
value.excerpt: In this vlog, we will learn how we can use SharePoint Online List as a Data Source in Power BI. Power BI provides various online services to consume data from different data source. value.title: 3 steps to pin Reporting Services visuals to a Power BI Dashboard
value.excerpt: In this video, I show how you can configure Reporting Services to integrate with Power BI and then pin visualizations from a paginated report to a Power BI dashboard.   There are three main steps you have to do to get this to work.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx

value.title: Create reports in the browser for Power BI Embedded and other updates
value.excerpt: March 2017 is bringing a lot of updates to Power BI Embedded including the ability to create reports within the browser.
